text: the Supreme Court of Bangladesh is the
highest court and it has dismissed the
appeal the dismiss the appeal by Abdul
Kadir mullah a senior Islamist leader
whether the court could hear a review
petition on his death sentence that was

two months ago in September
this comes after in February when the
international crimes tribunal had
initially sentenced him to life followed
by mass protests which led to a change
in the law based on which the Supreme

and yesterday there was a hearing over
whether mr. mullah would be able to

this comes after a dramatic turn of
